TopicTitle: Can't change keybinds' "Staging / Docking (translation) / Docking (rotation)" mode things.

Articles.Content:
I click which thing I want it to be but it never saves it, even if I click "Accept".

Mods:

Toolbar

Active Texture Management

EVE

Astronomer's Visual Enhancements: Edge of Oblivion

Chatterer

CollisionFX

Distant Object Enhancement

Hotrockets

Planetshine

Smokescreen

Texture Replacer
I found the same problem, and is really anoying since this bug prevents me for using the docking panel with default configuration.
